import Card from './Card' import CardSection from './CardSection' import MultiAvatarUnit from './MultiAvatarUnit' import Link from 'next/link' import { conceptToDisplayName } from '../utils/utils' const NewConceptsNeedExplanationsCard = props => { return (

Contribute wacky and wonderful explanations to these ideas.

{conceptToDisplayName(props.concepts[0].conceptName)}

{ props.concepts[0].numContributors > 0 && } { props.concepts[0].numContributors == 0 &&

no one has contributed an explanation yet

} { props.concepts[0].numContributors > 0 &&

{props.concepts[0].numContributors > 4 ? '+ 3 others have added explanations' : 'have added explanations'}

}
Contribute

Integrals

+ 3 others have added explanations

Contribute

{`+ ${props.totalConcepts} other ideas`}

Expand
 ) } export default NewConceptsNeedExplanationsCard
